[Page Title: Frannie & The Fox Restaurant Menus | Charleston, SC]

Skip to content 
Menus

Regional Ingredients. Italian Sensibilities.

Frannie & The Fox is a wood-fired eatery with Italian sensibilities, serving regional ingredients in an honest and straightforward environment. The menu features shareable and thoughtfully sourced dishes from local purveyors.

Featured Recipes

Frannie & The Fox invites you to try a few of our favorite recipes at home. And when youâ€™re not up to cooking, know that you can always join us in the foxhole.
Caprese Salad Parmesan Arancini

[Page Title: Frannie & The Fox Private Dining | Charleston, SC]

Skip to content 
Large Parties & Private Dining

Impress Your Guests: Exceptional Events at Frannie

Whether a corporate dinner, family gathering, or a more intimate affair, host your special occasion at Frannie & The Fox.

Our private dining room fits up to 30 guests for intimate events looking for the flexibility of a restaurant with the high touch advance planning of a catered event.

Southern Hospitality at Frannie's

Frannie & The Fox is the consummate host and offers unique group dining experiences with fully customizable menus.

Our private and semi-private indoor spaces pair perfectly with our Chefâ€™s catering menus, plus our exceptional service for private affairs served with a side of Southern hospitality.

Note: Private and semi-private spaces are subject to availability. A contract and deposit may be required for larger events.
Plan Your Special Event Today 
Chef Curated Private Dining Menus

Frannie & The Fox Chefs have created menus perfect for corporate dinners, family gatherings, and any reason you may find a dedicated room all to yourself.

Note: Custom menus require 72-hour notice.
Learn More 
â€œWell that just dills my pickle.â€ Our onsite team is dedicated to flawless events from menu planning, decor, onsite support and day-of service.

For the adventure seeking, campfire loving, culinary enthusiast in us all, Frannie & The Fox presents a wood burning concept of shareable dishes. Whether youâ€™re a guest of the Holy City or a Charlestonian, you will find a warm and engaging environment anytime.

Our courtyard and adjacent greenhouse offer open-air dining in a gardenesque vibe and are perfect for special occasions.

Frannie & The Fox is a wood-fired eatery with Italian sensibilities, serving regional ingredients in an honest and straightforward environment. The menu features shareable and thoughtfully sourced dishes from local purveyors.
